name: SSF21
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 21
subtitle: Response to Neoadjuvant Therapy
notes: **Note**:  Review the medical record for a specific statement by a physician about the response to neoadjuvant therapy.  Do not try to interpret or infer a response based on other documentation in the medical record such as a description of residual tumor on the pathology report.  Use code 999 if it is unknown if neoadjuvant therapy was given.
rows: Response noted but no mention if it was complete or partial
Not applicable:  Neoadjuvant therapy not given

Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
(If this information is required by your standard setter, use of code 988 may result in an edit error.)

OBSOLETE DATA CONVERTED V0203
See code 987

No neoadjuvant therapy

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
